author: Selim Anaç
description: This is a Dynamic AABB Tree native extension with Branch and Bound Algorithm.
name: DAABBCC

releases.message:
- Missing App Manifest file removed from game.project
- Android build fix: https://github.com/selimanac/defold-daabbcc/pull/14 [Thanks to [farmatholin](https://github.com/farmatholin)]
- A small but important fix related to gameobject size calculation. If you are using `daabbcc.update_gameobject_size(),` you should update to this version.
No changes. This is the final release before v3.0 Beta, which includes code refactoring and new features.

- Internal Update Frequency added. Default value is set from game.project file (display.frequency).  
It is now possible to set a new internal(independent from Defold game loop) update frequency by using `aabb.update_frequency()`.
- Fixed [#9](https://github.com/selimanac/DAABBCC/issues/9#issue-1533854235)

- Table count added to query results.
 - Documentation update

2.1

- [x] It is now possible to sort results by distance. Use `raycast_sort`, `query_id_sort`, `query_sort` according to your needs [#5](https://github.com/selimanac/DAABBCC/issues/5).
- [x] Automated position updates for Defold Gameobjects [#6](https://github.com/selimanac/DAABBCC/issues/6).
- [x] External Array and HashTable libs are removed. 
- [x] Group limit removed (previously the number of groups was limited to 20)
- [x] Remove Gameobject when AABB or Group removed 
- [x] Clear function added for removing and resetting everything. 
- [x] Stop/Resume for automated Gameobject position updates.
- [x] All query results return nil when they are empty. No need to check `#count` anymore.
New version is on the way. I'm going to drop supporting v1.0
